subject: Re: New Hack is up on my site
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Takes batteries - must be amplified.  Great find for $5.00!

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Debbie Tejada <debbie@...> wrote:
>
> FYI, I was in Bed Bath & Beyond today and found a small speaker on  
> their clearance rack. It plugs into the earphone jack of your 
sound  
> device, and has fairly decent sound for something so small and 
cheap.  
> They had about 4 or 5, I bet other BB&B stores would have them. 
Photo  
> attached below. Its a Spi Mini Hi-Fi Speaker, they had black or 
white,  
> for $4.99 (half price). It takes 2 AAA batteries. Works great with 
my  
> new RS 12-470.
> 
> Deb T
>
